more.about: L Concepts is an emerging food and beverage player that focuses on the development of unique gastronomic experiences in Southeast Asia. L Concepts currently owns a collection of leading restaurant brands, franchises and lifestyle concepts across the premium casual and fast casual dining segments including L’Usine, ‘NAMO Artisanal Pizzeria, ‘NAMO Tuscan Grill and Sizzlin’ Steak.
